seo.title: Transition coaching for global moves | SustainSage
seo.description: ICF-aligned coaching to steady international relocations, role changes, and life transitions while you stay grounded.

hero.title: Steady your relocation or role shift without losing yourself.
hero.subtitle: We co-design structure around visas, careers, and community so you can move with clarity.

who.title: Who this is for
items: You’re relocating to the UK while still managing responsibilities in another country.
You and a partner or family are negotiating different timelines, visas, or schooling.
You’re switching sector or function at the same time as moving.
You’re rebuilding routines after burnout or a difficult exit.

what.title: What we work on
items: Clarifying practical decisions across immigration, finances, care, and timelines.
Translating your experience and leadership story for UK recruiters and stakeholders.
Designing sustainable experiments to test roles, consulting, or hybrid setups.
Building support systems so you can integrate in the UK while honouring commitments elsewhere.

how.title: How it works
how.description: A 3–4 month partnership paced to match your transition.
items: Six 60-minute sessions over 12–16 weeks via Zoom, scheduled around your relocation timeline.
Each session is co-designed; we review learning and recalibrate priorities together.
Between-session support via secure notes or Loom updates when decisions need timely reflection.
We offer structure, questions, and resources without guarantees of specific job or visa outcomes.

items.title: Coordinating a dual-location move
items.description: We mapped decision windows for a Singapore–London relocation, aligned partner expectations, and rehearsed conversations with HR about visas and flexible working.

items.title: Switching sector while settling
items.description: A corporate strategist moving into UK charity leadership translated achievements, planned informational interviews, and paced applications to avoid burnout.

items.title: Rebuilding after a difficult exit
items.description: We created rest and learning cycles after redundancy, structured finances, and designed pilot consulting offers before committing to full-time roles.

expect.title: What you can expect
items: Clearer priorities across personal, professional, and logistical commitments.
Language that explains your story with confidence in UK contexts.
Sustainable routines and boundaries that protect energy during change.
Increased agency to choose next steps instead of reacting to urgency.

ethics.title: Ethics & fit
items: ICF-trained coaching with confidentiality agreements that respect self-funded or sponsored work.
We signpost therapy, legal, or immigration specialists when they can support you better.
You set the pace and focus; we co-design without pressure or hustle scripts.
No commissions or hidden referrals—recommendations are transparent and client-led.

cta.title: Ready to explore your next move with steadiness?
cta.body: Book an intro conversation so we can hear your context and confirm the fit.
